welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stansted Mountfitchet, where charming cobblestone streets, historic buildings, and quaint shops await you. Relax and immerse yourself in our town's rich history and vibrant culture, and make the most of your stay here. Enjoy!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights at Wethersfield Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is currently under construction and will handle all low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
